title: Deaths per day in West African countries with 2014 Ebola outbreak by disease
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of deaths per day for 6 number of Diseasess.
The Number of deaths per day is appeared to be the highest at Diseases HIV/AIDS and lowest at Diseases Ebola.
The difference of Number of deaths per day between the highest and lowest Diseases is 681.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of deaths per day for 6 number of Diseasess.
The maximum Number of deaths per day 685.0 is found at Diseases HIV/AIDS and the minimum is found at Ebola where Diseases is 4.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of deaths per day for 6 number of Diseasess.
The Number of deaths per day is appeared to be the highest at Diseases HIV/AIDS and lowest at Diseases Ebola.
The difference of Number of deaths per day between the highest and lowest Diseases is 681.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Diseases in the x axis and Number of deaths per day in the y axis.
Diseases HIV/AIDS has the highest Number of deaths per day and Ebola has the lowest Number of deaths per day.
Second maximum Number of deaths per day is found at Diseases Malaria.
The highest Diseases HIV/AIDS has 681.0 more Number of deaths per day than the lowest Diseases Ebola.
Number of deaths per day at Diseases HIV/AIDS is 685.0 , second place is Malaria at 552.0, and thirdly is Diarrhoea at 404.0.
The lowest value 4.0 at Ebola is almost 2.32 times smaller than the average value 294.83.
